channel.title: SubText on Maurizio Tammacco's blog 4.0
channel.description: Recent content in SubText on Maurizio Tammacco's blog 4.0

item.title: Blog moved to WordPress
item.description: It’s long time I don’t write anything on this blog, I was very busy in recent times, but now the time has come and I intend to regain the time lost. When I came back to this blog, the first thing I noticed were the look & feel and the software engine on which it was based, SubText, a very old bog software, but still widely used, so I decided to move it to another platform, possibly in step with times, and my choice was WordPress.
